text: The only 'poor leadership' we've seen is from you and your Administration. Our fellow Americans need us. Lay off the tweets, more action. https://twitter.com/realdonaldtrump/status/914089003745468417 QT @realDonaldTrump ...Such poor leadership ability by the Mayor of San Juan, and others in Puerto Rico, who are not able to get their workers to help. They....
RT @FEMARegion6 NEW Disaster Recovery Centers open today (9/30) in Liberty & Galveston County. For details on hours and location: https://go.usa.gov/xnq7R

RT @KamalaHarris No American ​city ​should have to beg the federal government for help in the middle of a crisis. ​We must pass aid to PR now. https://twitter.com/jbendery/status/913858201623416832 QT @jbendery WOW. San Juan mayor: "I am going to do what I never thought I would do. I am begging, begging anyone who can hear us to save us from dying.

Will you stand with me with a contribution of $50, $25, or even just $5?

Thank you! #CruzCrew #TXSen
#CruzCrew: we have a critical FEC fundraising deadline at midnight tonight: http://cruzcrew.com/MidnightTonight #TXSen

RT @FEMARegion6 TX: free laundry services for City of Dickinson residents in Galveston County https://twitter.com/LGUSSupport/status/913879058609557506 QT @LGUSSupport Thank you @GalvNews for helping get the word out about our free laundry services at 2504 44th St, Dickinson, TX 77539 8am-6pm daily http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DK6_z7IWkAEn_Ug.jpg
When times are tough, we stand united. Donate to the people of Puerto Rico now: http://kamala.to/PuertoRico
Our brothers and sisters in Puerto Rico are American citizens who need our help. I stand with San Juan Mayor @CarmenYulinCruz.
The definition of "poor leadership" is sitting at your golf club while millions of US citizens beg for your help, @realDonaldTrump.
Disaster relief workers & volunteers are doing God's work right now. PR needs help, not bullying, from the @POTUS. http://www.wbur.org/news/2017/09/30/national-guard-unit-red-cross-puerto-rico
PR is in CRISIS. US citizens are dying. Millions of people need their govt's help. Stop playing politics with their lives, @realDonaldTrump.
FEMA's Puerto Rico plans are outdated & are outpaced by charities. Distribution is woefully inadequate & people need basic medical care now.
I just got off the phone with Mayor @CarmenYulinCruz. I told her to keep up her heroic work & leadership on behalf of Puerto Rico.
The people of Puerto Rico are suffering. They lack clean drinking water and many of them are without electricity. Congress must act now.

RT @kylegriffin1 Trump starts his day at Trump Nat'l Golf Club in N.J.

This is his 67th day at a golf course, 87th day at a Trump property as president.

We can't forget about the US Virgin Islands. Back-to-back storms left many struggling to recover.
